document.full_text: dancing in circles with decorative daggers, tribesmen seem a festive addition to anti-government rallies in sanaa. but to some, they signal the potential for yemen protests to split the country apart.
document.title: as tribes join protests, yemen edges closer to brink
lines_and_colors: dancing in circles with decorative daggers, tribesmen seem a festive addition to anti-government rallies in sanaa. but to some, they signal the potential for yemen protests to split the country apart.
